item.title: Italy's Meloni ready to help if Vatican agrees to Trump's war mediation plan
item.description: For now the Holy See says the idea of even hosting talks is more a hope than a concrete plan.

item.title: French paedophile surgeon says he is 'responsible' for deaths of two victims
item.description: Joel Le Scouarnec, who has been on trial since February, has admitted to sexually abusing hundreds of patients.

item.title: British surgeon's 'high anxiety' operating in Gaza
item.description: Dr Rose has been describing life at Nassar Hospital in Gazan city of Khan Younis.

item.title: Three killed after floods ravage French Riviera region
item.description: One couple died after being trapped by rising waters in a resort town; a third victim died in their car.

item.title: UK sanctions 'godmother' of Israel's settler movement Daniella Weiss
item.description: The foreign secretary said the move "demonstrates our determination to hold extremist settlers to account".
